Set.Text: The Stone Works increases a City's [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone, [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble and [ICON_RES_CLAY] Clay. It requires an improved source of any near your City to be built.
Each source of [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone, [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble and [ICON_RES_CLAY] Clay worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.

The University increases the [ICON_RESEARCH] Science output of the city, and it gets bonus [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from jungle tiles and sources of [ICON_RES_URANIUM] Uranium worked nearby. The city must already have a Library (or Paper Maker) in order to construct a University.

The Mint increases the amount of [ICON_GOLD] from worked sources of [ICON_RES_GOLD] Gold, [ICON_RES_SILVER] Silver and [ICON_RES_COPPER] Copper. The City must have at least one of these resources mined nearby to build the Mint.

The Research Laboratory is a late-game building which greatly increases the [ICON_RESEARCH] Science output of a city. It also gets bonus [ICON_RESEARCH] Science from each sources of [ICON_RES_GEMS] Gems worked by the City. The city must already possess a Public School to construct the Research Laboratory.

The Circus increases the [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness of your empire but requires ether an improved source of [ICON_RES_IVORY] Ivory or [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horse near your City to be built. It also increases the [ICON_GOLD] Gold income of those resources.
Each source of [ICON_RES_GEMS] Gems worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.
Each source of [ICON_RES_IVORY] Ivory worked by this City produces +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold

Each source of [ICON_RES_GOLD] Gold, [ICON_RES_COPPER] Copper and [ICON_RES_SILVER] Silver worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have at least one of these resources mined nearby.
Each source of [ICON_RES_URANIUM] Uranium worked by this City produces +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Each Jungle tile worked by this City produces +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.
Each source of [ICON_RES_URANIUM] Uranium worked by this City produces +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Each Jungle tile worked by this City produces +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.
Each source of [ICON_RES_DEER] Deer, [ICON_RES_WHEAT] Wheat, [ICON_RES_RICE] Rice, [ICON_RES_MAIZE] Maize and [ICON_RES_BANANA] Banana worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
